original_text: I have woken up a ruler, who is coming with his army from the north. He comes from a land in the east, where the sun rises, and he will use my name to call to me. He will walk over rulers of other nations as if they are mud. He will push them down with his feet, like a potter who prepares his clay. I have woken up a ruler, who is coming with his army from the north. He comes from a land in the east, where the sun rises, and he will use my name to call to me. He will walk over rulers of other nations as if they are mud. He will push them down with his feet, like a potter who prepares his clay. I have woken up a ruler,
korean_text: 내가 한 사람을 일으켜 북방에서 오게 하며 내 이름을 부르는 자를 해 돋는 곳에서 오게 하였나니 그가 이르러 고관들을 석회 같이, 토기장이가 진흙을 밟음 같이 하리니

sentences.original_text: I have woken up a ruler
who is coming with his army from the north
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 북쪽에서 군대를 이끌고 오고 있다

sentences.original_text: He comes from a land in the east
and he will use my name to call to me
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 내 이름을 불러 나를 부를 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will walk over rulers of other nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 나라 통치자들을 걸어 다닐 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will push them down with his feet
like a potter who prepares his clay
